=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2022-09-07)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.2.0 (2023-07-11)
------------------

* Many functions used for 4D-STEM analysis have been added.
* OOP is avoided as much as possible.

0.3.0 (2023-07-11)
------------------

* Tests are increasing in number
* init includes import of mcemtools

0.4.0 (2023-07-11)
------------------

* Many small bugs are fixed
